solvents.name: 1-Methylimidazole
solvents.preparation: distilled before use under reduced pressure (boiling point, 148° to 150°C)

synthesis_conditions.equipment: borosilicate glass culture tube, temperature-controlled oil bath
synthesis_conditions.method: The reaction mixture was homogenized by briefly grinding by hand with a glass stirring rod, then heated unsealed.

SCXRD.equipment: Bruker diffractometer with a PLATFORM three-circle goniometer and an APEX II charge-coupled device area detector
